function read_sade_prodfile_text,prodfile template=CREATE_STRUCT('VERSION', 1.0,$ 'DATASTART',0,$ 'DELIMITER', ' ',$ ;IS SPACE DELIMITED 'MISSINGVALUE',-999,$ 'COMMENTSYMBOL','"',$ 'FIELDCOUNT',[1],$ 'FIELDTYPES', [7],$ 'FIELDNAMES', ['badprod'],$ 'FIELDLOCATIONS',[0],$ 'FIELDGROUPS',[1]) prodDATA = READ_ASCII(prodFILE,TEMPLATE=TEMPLATE) RETURN,prodDATA end
